doc.field: The Brooklyn Fox Corporation records are housed in a single bound volume and dated 1937. The papers include certificates of incorporation, court papers, bonds, correspondence, and other documents. The Brooklyn Fox Corporation was a real estate development and management company that specialized in all types of commercial and residential properties, including theaters, hotels, apartment buildings, office buildings, and storefronts.

Gift of the Louis Stein Center for Law and Ethics, 1992.
